title.native: Lv2からチートだった元勇者候補のまったり異世界ライフ
title.romaji: Lv2 Kara Cheat datta Moto Yuusha Kouho no Mattari Isekai Life
title.english: Chillin' in Another World with Level 2 Super Cheat Powers

description:
The Magical Kingdom of Klyrode summons hundreds of heroes from other worlds every year to fight in their war against the Dark One and his army of powerful demons. Banaza is one of those heroes, summoned from the Royal Capital Paluma, but something’s not right—Banaza is only an average merchant. He has no magic, no fighting ability, and his stats are abysmal. Worse, a mishap leaves him unable to return home! Rejected as a hero and stranded in another world, abandoned to the far reaches of the kingdom by a cruel king who just wants him gone, Banaza’s fate looks pretty bleak. But what will happen once the failed hero candidate finds himself with super cheat powers once he hits level two?

(Source: J-Novel Club)
synonyms: Chillin Different World Life of the Ex-Brave Candidate Was Cheat from Lv2
Cuộc sống thảnh thơi tại dị giới gian lận của cựu ứng viên dũng giả từ cấp độ hai

tags.name: Isekai
tags.description: Features characters being transported into an alternate world setting and having to adapt to their new surroundings.

tags.name: Magic
tags.description: Prominently features magical elements or the use of magic.

tags.name: Male Protagonist
tags.description: Main character is male.

tags.name: Monster Girl
tags.description: Prominently features a female character who is part-monster.

tags.name: Kemonomimi
tags.description: Prominently features humanoid characters with animal ears.

tags.name: Demons
tags.description: Prominently features malevolent otherworldly creatures.

tags.name: Heterosexual
tags.description: Prominently features a romance between a man and a woman, not inherently sexual.

tags.name: Shapeshifting
tags.description: Features character(s) who changes one's appearance or form.

tags.name: Female Protagonist
tags.description: Main character is female.

tags.name: Marriage
tags.description: Centers around marriage between two or more characters.

tags.name: Iyashikei
tags.description: Primary aim is to heal the audience through serene depictions of characters' daily lives.

tags.name: Nudity
tags.description: Features a character wearing no clothing or exposing intimate body parts.

tags.name: Anthropomorphism
tags.description: Contains non-human character(s) that have attributes or characteristics of a human being.

tags.name: Swordplay
tags.description: Prominently features the use of swords in combat.

tags.name: Agriculture
tags.description: Prominently features agriculture practices.

tags.name: Tomboy
tags.description: Features a girl who exhibits characteristics or behaviors considered in many cultures to be typical of boys.

tags.name: Archery
tags.description: Centers around the sport of archery, or prominently features the use of archery in combat.

tags.name: Gender Bending
tags.description: Prominently features a character who dresses and behaves in a way characteristic of another gender, or has been transformed into a person of another gender.

tags.name: Time Manipulation
tags.description: Prominently features time-traveling or other time-warping phenomena.

tags.name: Elf
tags.description: Prominently features a character who is an elf.

tags.name: Time Skip
tags.description: Features a gap in time used to advance the story.

node.description: **Honami Yamagishi** is a Japanese editor, who provides editing assistance to various works.

[Wiki (jp)](https://ja.wikipedia.org/wiki/明田川仁)

Affiliated with Magic Capsule, a recording studio led by his father [Susumu Aketagawa](https://anilist.co/staff/120062).

[Website](https://dialogue-music.jp/) | [Twitter](https://twitter.com/DIALOGUE_staff) | [Instagram](https://www.instagram.com/dialogue_staff) | [YouTube](https://www.youtube.com/c/DIALOGUEOfficialChannel) | [TikTok](https://www.tiktok.com/@dialogue_official)

DIALOGUE+ is a voice actress unit composed of the following members:

- [Yurina Uchiyama](https://anilist.co/staff/204404/Yurina-Uchiyama)
- [Nene Hieda](https://anilist.co/staff/163903/Nene-Hieda)
- [Kyouka Moriya](https://anilist.co/staff/164774/Kyouka-Moriya)
- [Yuuna Ogata](https://anilist.co/staff/190470/Yuuna-Ogata)
- [Ayaka Takamura](https://anilist.co/staff/204409/Ayaka-Takamura)
- [Satsuki Miyahara](https://anilist.co/staff/204411/Satsuki-Miyahara)
- [Mayu Iizuka](https://anilist.co/staff/166401/Mayu-Iizuka)
- [Manatsu Murakami](https://anilist.co/staff/204420/Manatsu-Murakami)

__[Artist Profile (High Kick)](https://highkick.jp/kushitamine)__

__Introduction:__
Mine Kushita, alternatively known by his birthname Yuuji Takinoue, otherwise previously known under stage name U-ZY is a Japanese composer, arranger and lyricist.

__Biography:__
He was a member of the solo vocal project Ikuta Machine, together with fellow composer and arranger Chikara Kurata (倉田主税) between 2008-2014,  until 2014 when U-ZY (which he was known as at the time) left the project. After leaving he changed his name from U-ZY to Mine Kushita, which is an anagram of Ikuta Machine.

[Website](http://www.kanekomayumi.com/) | [Twitter](https://twitter.com/kanek0mayumi)

Mayumi Kaneko is a singer, composer, arranger and lyricist.

[Website](http://www.kanekomayumi.com/) | [Twitter](https://twitter.com/kanek0mayumi)

Mayumi Kaneko is a singer, composer, arranger and lyricist.

__Height:__ 159 cm
__Agency:__ I'm Enterprise

[Twitter](https://twitter.com/rie_k_0530) | [Profile (I'm Enterprise)](https://www.imenterprise.jp/profile.php?id=52) | [Blog](https://ameblo.jp/kugimiyarie-blog/) | [Lantis Music](https://www.lantis.jp/artist/kugimiyarie/)

**Non-Anime Roles:**
- Irene - Arknights (VG)
- Unknown God - Genshin Impact (VG)
- Kiana Kaslana - Honkai Impact 3rd (VG)
- Luna - Punishing: Gray Raven (VG)
- Vesti - Goddess of Victory: Nikke (VG)
- iDoll Ocean - Goddess of Victory: Nikke (VG)
- Haruka Sawamura - Yakuza Series (VG)
- Vena - TEVI (VG)
- Fukayama Ayane - Nogizaka Haruka no Himitsu: Cosplay, Hajimemashita (VN)

__[Artist Profile (High Kick)](https://highkick.jp/kushitamine)__

__Introduction:__
Mine Kushita, alternatively known by his birthname Yuuji Takinoue, otherwise previously known under stage name U-ZY is a Japanese composer, arranger and lyricist.

__Biography:__
He was a member of the solo vocal project Ikuta Machine, together with fellow composer and arranger Chikara Kurata (倉田主税) between 2008-2014,  until 2014 when U-ZY (which he was known as at the time) left the project. After leaving he changed his name from U-ZY to Mine Kushita, which is an anagram of Ikuta Machine.

__Likes:__ Fried Chicken and Clams
__Dislikes:__ Tomatoes and Natto

__Introduction:__
Tomoya Tabuchi is a Japanese musician, lyricist, bassist, composer and arranger. He is in charge of the bass and chorus for the three-piece rock band [UNISON SQUARE GARDEN](https://anilist.co/staff/119406/Unison-Square-Garden), and for the rock band [THE KEBABS](https://ja.wikipedia.org/wiki/THE_KEBABS), he also takes part in the [Q-MHz](https://ja.wikipedia.org/wiki/Q-MHz) music production team.

__Biography:__
Tomoya is the same age as the two other UNISON SQUARE GARDEN members, Kousuke Saito (斎藤宏介) who is also a high school and university classmate, and Suzuki Takao (鈴木貴雄) who is an elementary school classmate. In elementary school, he was obsessed with soccer, to the point that he'd become a "soccer boy". His future dream at the time, was to become a junior league soccer player. Band member Suzuki Takao participated in the same soccer club, as well. When he was in fifth grade of elementary school, he had to move from Funabashi City, Chiba to Setagaya-ku, Tokyo due to his father's work.

In later years he graduated from the Faculty of Political Science and Economics at Waseda University. His specialized field is finance theory.

__Likes:__ Fried Chicken and Clams
__Dislikes:__ Tomatoes and Natto

__Introduction:__
Tomoya Tabuchi is a Japanese musician, lyricist, bassist, composer and arranger. He is in charge of the bass and chorus for the three-piece rock band [UNISON SQUARE GARDEN](https://anilist.co/staff/119406/Unison-Square-Garden), and for the rock band [THE KEBABS](https://ja.wikipedia.org/wiki/THE_KEBABS), he also takes part in the [Q-MHz](https://ja.wikipedia.org/wiki/Q-MHz) music production team.

__Biography:__

In elementary school, he was obsessed with soccer, to the point that he'd become a "soccer boy". His future dream at the time, was to become a junior league soccer player. Band member Suzuki Takao participated in the same soccer club, as well. When he was in fifth grade of elementary school, he had to move from Funabashi City, Chiba to Setagaya-ku, Tokyo due to his father's work.

In later years he graduated from the Faculty of Political Science and Economics at Waseda University. His specialized field is finance theory.
A composer affiliated with MONACA since 2015

[Twitter](https://twitter.com/HEYSUEZO) | [LinkedIn](https://www.linkedin.com/in/jallenlord/)

Affiliated with [Crunchyroll](https://anilist.co/studio/6421) as an ADR Director.
ADR Engineer at FUNimation Entertainment, however has since expanded to also being a Mixing Engineer.
